body: Hi Kimia, Firstly, I'm sorry, the breps are 2, 3 and 4 and not 1, 2, 3 that I wrote yesterday. I suggest that you fix your issue before making your definitive brep, but if it is not possible you can follow the possible method showed below. BEFORE [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Wui*gYiAaOqogskAExr80YAOdSBjWx3*5mO4x7fXvygLCU-83IqacomWO44eV39wcTY*vduowF4DKRkDh7AXzes95VOibWdY/ERROR.png) AFTER [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Wui*gYiAaOoM0M8wPEXkBHpV7ikgBe3fQP9l6XkudopdQBr4-wyQFCSwSJ*NBlpQec4lj*tG*wgA35sp-*FcqasOQ3y-7VNC/fix.png) Bests Antonello
